column4: boy, i wish i didnt exceed my download limit by downloading linux distros so many times. now im on dialup speed! its killing me!
Well, I'm trying to do Dapper updates on dialup now, so I can almost relate.
omg thats what im doing aswel it says its going to take 9 hours
13 here.  Problem is I can't still be connected in the morning in case someone else wants to get on, so I have to figure out how to stop it after a few hours.
